files.patch:

@@ -36,0 +35,4 @@

+ *       - owned object with N waitings to be notified
+ *       - owned object with N waitings to enter, from 0 to N waitings to re-enter,
+ *         from N to 0 waitings to be notified
@@ -37,4 +40,1 @@

- * COMMENTS

+    static Thread[] thr = new Thread[NUMBER_OF_THREADS];
